title: Japanese Vocabulary Quiz: Everyday Objects and Places
description: Test your knowledge of everyday Japanese vocabulary with this quiz. Explore words for various objects and places, from blue cherry blossoms to a coffee shop. Each question provides options, a hint, and the correct answer in Japanese characters and Romaji. Enjoy the challenge and expand your Japanese language skills!

items.question: あおざくら
items.hint: The Japanese word for blue cherry blossoms.

items.question: きんこう
items.hint: The Japanese word for balance or harmony.

items.question: さつまいも
items.hint: The Japanese word for sweet potato.

items.question: てがみや
items.hint: The Japanese word for post office.

items.question: きっさてん
items.hint: The Japanese word for coffee shop.

items.question: すいせんじょう
items.hint: The Japanese word for water fountain.

items.question: はし
items.hint: The Japanese word for chopsticks or bridge.
